name: Abu Noman Md Sakib
headline: Ph.D. Student in Computer Science at UTSA
bio: Abu Noman Md Sakib is a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at The University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA), advised by Dr. Zijie J. Wang. His research interests include secure and trustworthy machine learning, computer vision, and AI safety, with current work on safety in large language and multimodal models, robustness and privacy in machine learning, backdoor attack/defense, federated learning, and LLM agent workflows.
affiliation: University of Texas at San Antonio
highlights: Ph.D. student in Computer Science at UTSA
Advised by Dr. Zijie J. Wang
Research focus: secure and trustworthy ML, computer vision, and AI safety
